property.name: INVALID_CONFIGURATION_MESSAGE
property.value: Configuration is not valid, setting invalid values to default values!

property.name: MUST_BE_INTEGER_FORMAT_STRING
property.value: Input cannot be integer, setting it to %d

property.name: MUST_BE_NON_NEGATIVE_FORMAT_STRING
property.value: Input cannot be negative, setting it to %d

property.name: MUST_BE_NON_ZERO_FORMAT_STRING
property.value: Input cannot be zero, setting it to %d

property.name: MUST_BE_WITHIN_RANGE_FORMAT_STRING
property.value: Input must be between %d and %d inclusive, setting it to %d
